tva:Genre.tva:Name: Humanities
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: The branches of learning regarded as having primarily a cultural character and which usually include language, literature, history, mathematics and philosophy

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: soooooo﻿ sad
I'm agree with Mann﻿ grewal. It's looks like a big misunderstanding btwn Arnav's mom and dad and Arnav's mom doesn't gave any chance to explain anything.
nice﻿ episode!
i really wana watch watch shyam gettin biten up after watchin the promo arnav u shud not leave him jus kill him he﻿ is responsible for anjali
Thank﻿ god shayam is finally in front of arnav !

I think Garima wasn't at fault. I guess she din' know that arnav's dad was a married man. She got with him but after knowing the truth, she went away with Shashi. It's Arnav's dad﻿ who's at fault but not Arnav's mother. She just couldn't take the pain of betrayal. This's my personal opinion. Let's see what happens next.

uff barun itni achi acting to srk b nhi kr skta u r﻿ the real king not srk aur itni achi chemistry to srk kajol ya salman madhuri mein b nhi hai arshi u rockxxxx and anjali di itni﻿ achi acting amazing
Arnav's going to go seriously blow up when﻿ he finds out about garima.
it is! And﻿ I hope everyone who said they would stop watching changed their minds after this episode
i always was thinking so, it is﻿ obvious

WOW! These actors are truly amaing. Their﻿ eyes, expressions and everything were just perfect! I was crying soo bad. I love Barun and Sanaya ALOT, but today another person shocked me and that was Daljet (Anjali) She was the person that started my tears, when she looked at Arnav, and when she touched her belly, her first expression just broke me...I love this show and all the actors. They are very very talanted!

uff barun itni achi acting to srk b nhi kr skta u r the real king not srk aur itni achi chemistry to srk kajol ya salman madhuri mein b nhi hai arshi u rockxxxx and anjali di itni achi acting amazing ye epi﻿ sadest epi hai ipkknd ki really cried .... :'(
i did from 5:25﻿ wen she looked at arnav n sob sob sob
Shitt shit shity shit this show is Frikin amazing it has it's ups and downs but at the end﻿ of the day this is hell of a show just awesome
i think arnav﻿ will hit sham
can shyam﻿ just go die in a hole please
beaten* ﻿
me too﻿ from 5.25
Kushi give full support to Arnav he needs that lets both of their love become very strong during difficult time love ARSHI and let Angeli﻿ and Dadi find the truth about that idiot Sham soonnnn

Yessssss!!!! Finally they come face to face!!! Pls dnt fall for his pretty words arnav n khushi once again!! This is getting interesting......!!
And I too think that it was all a misunderstanding between arnav's dad n mom, come on like he also kill himself in order to follow her if he really ddnt care about her!!!! Silly Mrs Malik misunderstood n just jumped to conclusions n took her life﻿ on her own daughters wedding day!? Now that's annoying!!!
be serious and sach﻿ sach bolo kon kon roya
I cried my heart out, seriously greta﻿ acting! Don't know about you but Daljeet just stunned me today. Barun and Sanaya, well they are just...perfect (even that seems like an understatement)
BECAUSE OF SHYAM UGGGH ARNAV WILL PUNCH SHYAM IN DA﻿ FACE XD !!!!!!

That's what i was thinking before but not anymore.Garima is hiding from dadi because dadi thinks she is responsible for her son and daughter-in-law's death every coin has two sides i think﻿ there is something else to the story..she is only hiding so that her past does not create any problem in khushi's wedding..may be they use to love each other before arnav's dad got married but Garima does not look like that she will have an affair with a married man and will destroy someone's marriage or life
oh God arnav ko agar pata chala k﻿ wo garima thiiiiiiiii haye arnav bechareki lyf tu qaymat hi qaymat :(

Reviewer.Books: ink heart, ink spell, ink death, the last apprentice revenge of the witch, the last apprentice curse of the bane, the last apprentice night of the soul stealer...... still reading fifty pages left.
